name: Fusionshock
description: This is my first attempting to create a roguelike first person shooter similar to Call of Duty Black Ops: Zombies. Currently this game is still a work in progress and more updates will roll out over the coming months. The game takes place in a distance future where the player will take the role of a sentient robot with some friends to take out the robot hive mind which is trying to whip out humanity.
